Uliana
Canada
One-Bedroom Apartment
8 nights · June 2025
Family
Reviewed: June 27, 2025
Spacious apartment in a perfect location with great views — but some outdated appliances could use a refresh.
Scored 7.0
7.0
The location was perfect — very central, with easy access to shops, cafes, and public transport. The view from the window was beautiful, overlooking a peaceful courtyard with trees and flowers. The apartment itself was spacious, which was great for our family. It was also well-equipped for staying with kids, and the host was always responsive and available when needed.
The TV was quite basic and didn’t support Netflix or YouTube, only regular channels. Some of the appliances, like the washing machine and dishwasher, were old and didn’t always work properly. Also, there was a noticeable smell coming from the cupboards when opened. Bathroom amenities (soap, shampoo) were provided in thick gel dispensers, which felt a bit unpleasant.

Mher
Belgium
Duplex Apartment
2 nights · September 2024
Solo traveler
Reviewed: October 16, 2024
I would not stay at this accommodation again and would not recommend it.
Scored 4.0
4.0
Good location in the city, close to cafes and not far from the train station.
I had a lot of issues with communicating from the host from the beginning. It started with finding out the address of the apartment is different to what is stated on Booking.com. To enter the apartment (after 19:00) I had to download an app which I wasn't aware of during booking, and quite late. Had I not have enough battery, data to download the app or been a person not accustomed to tech use or had accessibility barriers using the app, I could not have entered the apartment, not to mention having to share personal data with an unknown app is not great in terms of privacy. There were cockroaches in the apartment, including a huge one climbing onto the bedroom wall at night. My request to change the apartment was rejected. Instead the host suggested to spray poison in the apartment. That evening I saw another cockroach strolling around the kitchen, on cutlery and inside the toaster. I had to send a copy of my ID and deposit transfer confirmations via WhatsApp and email to the host, even though they noted that it's possible to do this via Booking.com (which I would prefer due to security reasons but which was not possible). Finally, I had to chase them to get the 300EUR deposit back after the 7 day limit within which they would have to return it even though I had contacted them a few days in advance to check if I can expect it on time and the host told me "of course." I would say all the issues came down to lack of care and communication by the host, which is a real pity because the apartment itself was quite nice and in a very good location in the city. If the host starts approaching it as a place where guests feel welcome and comfortable rather than a money-milking machine, things could considerably improve.

Amanda
United States
Two-Bedroom Apartment with Garden
3 nights · January 2024
Group
Reviewed: January 16, 2024
Nice place; terribly rude host which
Scored 4.0
4.0
Location and comfortable beds.
The lady who worked in the office was nice in person. I’m not sure who works their messaging account, but I highly do not recommend communicating with them on WhatsApp. They were extremely rude on WhatsApp. They accused us of having 3 additional guest while there. When in fact, I had contacted Booking customer service to inform them prior to checking in, that we would have 3 guest instead of 2. At the same time, I told them I do not have an IBAN account to give them the 300€ deposit; they said it’d be fine to go without. Then while boarding my plane, I was told I needed to give a 300€ cash deposit at the office prior to checking in and then pick up the deposit at check out (even though I was checking out prior to the office opening). The host was demanding via WhatsApp and rude. Was not helpful in regards to where to park, until I persistently asked several times.

I am Genius level 3 and use Booking almost monthly for stays, and this place was by far the rudest host. Would not recommend (and this is the first place I’ve ever not recommended)

Other things to note: no hand soap in the bathroom.

F
Francesco
Italy
Two-Bedroom Superior Apartment with Garden
5 nights · July 2024
Group
Reviewed: July 25, 2024
Almost a scamming
Scored 1.0
1.0
The position of the Apartment is very nice, close to the hystorical centre of Lisbon, although the Apartment we got was not in Rua Manuel Bernardes 3, as in the Booking confirmation, but in Rua da Quintinha 16. This is not far from the Booking location, but is completely different from the pictures you can see in the Booking.com site, and there only 1 Bathroom instead of 2 Bathrooms.
There are too many negatives, both from the apartment and from the host:
1. The apartment was different and worse than the one we booked: older, dirtier. 
 Only one bathroom instead of two bathrooms. 
 The second Bedroom with 2 small beds instead of a double bad.
2. Terrible cleaning, the apartment is infested with cockroaches, we find them dead and almost alive under the sofa, 
 other the furniture and near the large window. They were aware because there were traps everywhere (see photo)
 Outside the small garden had not been cleaned for a long time and was full of dead cockroaches.
 They came to clean when we complained.
3. I couldn't use the dishwasher because it was clogged with stagnant and smelly water inside.
 They came to fix it, just starting the machine.
4. the TV decoder didn't work. Never fixed.
5. last but not least, once I left the apartment, I asked to receive back the €300 deposit, which I paid via bank transfer. 
 For almost a week they used a different excuse every day not to return the money. They are using customers as a 
 bank to make money from your money in their bank account for an excessive week.

Half of my guests started sending me messages asking what time I should check out. On my penultimate day, I replied and said 11:00, but on the day of checkout at 9:00, the cleaning lady woke me up to start cleaning. I don't recommend this apartment to anyone....

Pessimo apartamento tudo começa pelo endereço que não é esse que tem no Booking depois a tv não funciona, o apartamento é para duas pessoas porque a água quente acaba no segundo banho, a mesa que se abriva para ficar maior era cheio de insetos. a metade da minha hospedagem me começa a mandar mensagem perguntando, a que hora faço o checkout no meu penultimo dia respondo e dico as 11:00, porém no dia do checkout as 9:00 tinha a moça da limpeza que me acorda, para começar a limpar não recomendo a ninguém esse apartamento….

Самое худшее жильё в моей жизни
Scored 1.0
1.0
Хорошая локация 
В доме есть необходимые вещи и чистые полотенца
Это аварийное жильё. Фото не соответствуют. Мы получили другую квартиру, не ту что на фото. Мы семья с детьми и нам дали дом на 4 этажа, в котором одна комната - один этаж. Нет гостиной. Мы никогда не бронируем даже двухуровневые апартаменты. Сантехника протекала. Плесень. Нижний этаж не пригоден для пребывания, там затхлых запах и плесень. Кровать на третьем этаже сломана и матрас прогибался. Не понимаю почему это стоило 1450€ за 10 дней. На террасе сухие цветы и сломанная мебель

Two-Bedroom Superior Apartment with Garden
6 nights · April 2025
Family
Reviewed: May 6, 2025
Não existe acessibilidade e isso é grave
Scored 1.0
1.0
A região é interessante e arejada.
Quando selecionamos o alojamento nos foi informado que tinha acessibilidade e estávamos com uma senhora de 89 anos, após a reserva, aquela que não devolve o investimento... vimos a informação de um lance de escadas...um lance? Uma escada de madeira com quase 20 degraus...além de um banheiro com banheira que ela não conseguia subir, para completar fomos num final de semana com feriado...vimos várias baratas andando transitando pela casa. As acomodações definitivamente precisam ser melhoradas, não tem acessibilidade, e não tem limpeza. A cláusula de não devolução é um absurdo, é coersivo num lugar que parece que tem certeza que terá desistência. Poças de água, já na cor esverdeada..sugiro que retirem a palavra acessibilidade do sua descrição e a não devolução de taxa de reserva é uma covardia pois te obriga a ficar em um lugar que não é como foi descrito., para pessoas de um outro país...foi o alojamento mais caro que pagamos na nossa viagem e o que mais trouxe frustrações. Dona Dina é o nome da senhora que fazia parte do grupo, levava um tempo tão grande para sair das acomodações que fazia isso apenas uma vez ao dia e algumas vezes desistiu de sair, assim como por pouco não sofreu uma queda, pois o corrimão não vai até o final dos degraus. E termino lembrando novamente...a escolha desse alojamento foi devido a acessibilidade informada, então, além de frustradas, nos sentimos enganadas. Solicito ao booking que reavalie esta acomodação, retirando a oferta de acessibilidade.

- blisko centrum i zabytkowych dzielnic Lizbony, wszystko w zasięgu pieszej wycieczki.
- ciśnienie wody
- generalnie wszystko: ciemne mieszkanie, przytłaczające, brak klimatyzacji
- ciężko wywietrzyć z uwagi na to, że mieszkanie jest na parterze na równo z chodnikiem. Otwarcie drzwi czy okna - ryzyko że ktoś wejdzie lub zaglądnie do mieszkania
- stare, rozpadające się meble
- dodatkowe WC bardzo ciasne i głośny wentylator
- zabity karaluch w łazience 
- dzielnica brudna
- brak miejsc parkingowych w pobliżu

Wir waren als Familie mit kleinen Kindern sehr enttäuscht und wurden die Wohnung nicht empfehlen.
Scored 1.0
1.0
Die Wohnung ist sehr zentral gelegen, an der Ecke ist ein nettes Café, auch Lebensmittelläden oder Restaurants sind schnell erreichbar. Man hat aus dem Zimmer einen schönen Blick auf das Parlamentsgebäude.
Die Wohnung mussten wir noch mal fegen, die Wasch- und Spülmaschinen waren komplett schimmelig und rochen stark, sowie zum Teil auch das Badezimmer. Die Wohnung ist überhaupt nicht für Familien mit kleinen Kindern geeignet, so wie es unser Fall war.
